title: Nami ult bugged again?
body: As Nami, my ults keep flying in wildly different directions than expected. Reminds me of a previous bug that did the exact same thing. Happened with 5 ults _today_. Nami's been in my top 3 since her release, so I'm pretty confident it's not me.

replies.body: When I played nami on one of my smurf accounts I aimed forwards and it was sent backwards, but that was a long time ago i havent played on my smurf for a long time...
Thanks for the report! Would you happen to have video of this occurring? I'm a Nami main and play her almost exclusively in ranked and haven't experienced this. D:
